title: Pasta with chilli, bacon and tomato sauce
description: This spicy, richly flavoured pasta dish is super quick to make. Use pancetta if you can’t find the cured pork cheeks.
ingredients: 130g/5oz guanciale (cured pork cheeks), cut into small cubes
1 hot dried red chilli, finely chopped
500g/1lb 2oz San Marzano tomatoes, cut into quarters
